1.1.0.name: wordpress/mint-sliders
1.1.0.description: This is a wordpress responsive images slider plugin. nextgen-gallery plugin is used to manage and upload images. skitter transaction effects are used in frontend. nextgen-gallery is a required plugin. Please download and install from http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/nextgen-gallery/. And do not forget to activate it after installation. Demo
